name: No Take Only Throw
description:
Game made for trijam #128
Theme: "Throw it to me"

Inspired by my dog Jessie, this is the first game I've ever made.

I went well past the goal time frame, but I'm happy with the result.

Dev:
Fonts used are : LightShadow by Kimeki and Seshat.
All Code and Artwork was created by me during the game jam using Godot and Figma
